ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Schedule__c, 'Yes'), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Payment_Schedule_Mode__c)), AND( NOT(Payment_Use_Primary_Bank_Account__c), ISNULL(Payment_Default_Bank_Account__c) ), ISBLANK(Payment_Schedule_Allotted_Amount__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Day_of_Month__c)), ISBLANK(Start_Date__c), AND( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Schedule_Mode__c, 'Amount'), ISBLANK(Drawdown_Amount__c) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Schedule_Mode__c, 'Date'), ISBLANK(End_Date__c) ) ), FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Payment Schedule is missing information. Please review the form and ensure that each field is filled out.
